properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 7:17PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Right Hand Chute Little River...
Saint Francis River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Right Hand Chute Little River at Rivervale
* from Sunday January 12 until further notice.
* At 7 PM Saturday the stage was 5.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 12.0 feet on Wednesday January 15.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Sunday January 12 and
continue to rise to near 12.0 feet by Wednesday January 15.
* At 12.0 feet...Evacuations may be necessary for some areas inside
the main levee system due to access problems. Field flooding is
widespread.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
